editors note This article was initially published in The Daily Gazette Swarthmores online daily newspaper founded in Fall  PERIOD As of Fall  the DG has merged with The Phoenix PERIOD See the about page to read more about the DG PERIOD

The Week in Pictures is a weekly photo spread of life at Swarthmore College put together by the staff of The Daily Gazette PERIOD If you have a photo you would like to submit or if youre interested in joining our media staff please send inquiries to Elna Ruyter  our Multimedia Editor at eruyter1swarthmore.edu
